description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Chains is a small puzzle game that is a sort of mix between Hexic and Tetris. Gameplay involves forming chains of colored blocks for points. The player must fight against the timer blocks; when one expires, a new line of blocks will fall, preventing a level up. The player can use special blocks such as Multiplier Blocks, Add Time Blocks, Bomb Blocks, Shuffle Blocks, and Lock Blocks.
